alert.note: Alert for Calhoun; Randolph (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 12 at 5:28PM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Randolph and central Calhoun Counties in southwestern Georgia through 615 PM EDT... At 528 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 7 miles north of Edison, or 8 miles southeast of Cuthbert, moving southeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Morgan, Edison, Arlington, Pachitla, Parksville, Carnegie, Moye, Cordrays Mill, Randolph Co A/p, Fountain Bridge, Goffs Mill, Turman, Shivers Mill, Aycock Mill, Martins Crossroads and Dickey. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
